movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

topRatedMovies.title: Forrest Gump
topRatedMovies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

topRatedMovies.title: The Matrix
topRatedMovies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

topRatedMovies.title: Goodfellas
topRatedMovies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

topRatedMovies.title: Avatar
topRatedMovies.plot: A paraplegic Marine is sent to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

topRatedMovies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
topRatedMovies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

recentMovies.title: Dune
recentMovies.plot: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

recentMovies.title: No Time to Die
recentMovies.plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

recentMovies.title: The Power of the Dog
recentMovies.plot: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

recentMovies.title: The French Dispatch
recentMovies.plot: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in 'The French Dispatch Magazine'.

recentMovies.title: Interstellar
recentMovies.plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival.
